titleStmt.title: Charles by the grace of God, King of Scotland ... forsameikle as out of the royall and fatherly care which we have had of the good and peace of this our ancient and native kingdome ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from text.
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Given under our signet at Glasgow the 29 of November, and of our reigne the fourteenth year. 1638."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
